channel.title: Geojson on Geospatial Python Developer
channel.description: Recent content in Geojson on Geospatial Python Developer

item.title: Render GeoJSON with Built-in Hugo Shortcode
item.description: Can we use Hugo’s built-in shortcodes to render a map from GeoJSON? Hugo has a built-in shortcode to render gists and GitHub will show any GeoJSON saved as a gist as a map. So, let’s give it a go: It works! Some relevant links: Gist meets GeoJSON geojson.io
